org.jetel.data

Class SetVal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.SetVal

  • public class SetVal
extends java.lang.Object
    Supporting "macros" for setting values of differend data fields
    Since:
    August 20, 2002

      • setString

        public static final void setString(DataRecord record,
             int fieldNo,
             java.lang.String value)
        Assign String value into field.
        The exact behaviour depens on type of the data filed. For fields other than String, the String is parsed to provide appropriate value.
        Parameters:
        record - data record containing field to set
        fieldNo - field ordinal number within record
        value - The new String value
        Since:
        August 20, 2002

        value - The new Date value

      • setValue

        public static final void setValue(DataRecord record,
            int fieldNo,
            java.lang.Object value)
        Assign Object value/reference into data field.
        What is going to be assigned depends on DataField type and Object type. This method/function can be used to set NULL value to any field type.
        Parameters:
        record - data record containing field to set
        fieldNo - field ordinal number within record
        value - The new Value value
        Since:
        August 23, 2002

      • setNull

        public static final void setNull(DataRecord record,
           int fieldNo)
        Set field's value to NULL.
        Warning: setting to NULL field which has specified not nullable option will raise BadDataFormatException
        Parameters:
        record -
        fieldNo -
        See Also:
        BadDataFormatException
